name: add-translation-button-extension
description: This extension adds one click translation button on GitHub, Hacker News, Stack Overflow and Reddit

scripts.release: webpack; mkdir ./add-translation-button-extension; cp -r ./dist ./add-translation-button-extension/; cp ./manifest.json ./add-translation-button-extension/; zip -r ./add-translation-button-extension.zip ./add-translation-button-extension; rm -rf ./add-translation-button-extension

author: Masahiro Saito
